name: Tesla vs Lovecraft: For Science!
summary:
This DLC includes: 
 
- The Dreamlands : Enjoy the infinite planes of the Dreamlands, ever increasing in difficulty and rewards. 
- Eldritch Signs: Completing a level with 100% health left will grant you an Eldritch Sign, as well as hefty crystal reward. 
- EPIC WEAPONS: An all-new form of EPIC, weapons. There's now an epic version of every weapon available. They are as crazy as they are rare. 
- New Monsters 
- New Weapons 
- New Perks 
- New Power-ups 
- New Abilities 
- New Inventions
